structure.unit: A CABINET FOR HEALTH AND FAMILY SERVICES

law.catch_line: Commonwealth Council on Developmental Disabilities -- Members -- Executive Director -- Duties -- Autism Spectrum Disorders Subcommittee.

text.section: The Commonwealth Council on Developmental Disabilities is created within the cabinet.
The Commonwealth Council on Developmental Disabilities is established to comply with the requirements of the Developmental Disabilities Act of 1984 and any subsequent amendment to that act.

The Commonwealth Council on Developmental Disabilities shall appoint a subcommittee, which shall include members of the Kentucky Commission on Autism Spectrum Disorders, to monitor the implementation of the state plan as developed by the commission beginning October 1, 2006. The subcommittee shall prepare, and the council shall submit, the report as required under KRS 194A.622 (10).
